channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Waymo seeking about $16 billion near $110 billion valuation
item.description: The parent company would provide about $13 billion to the robotaxi firm, while the rest would come from others, including new investors Sequoia Capita...

item.title: Kennedy Center to close for 2 years for renovations after a wave of canceled shows due to Trump adding his name to the building
item.description: Trump announced the closure days after the premiere of “Melania” a documentary of the first lady was shown at the storied venue.

item.title: SpaceX seeks FCC nod to build data center constellation in space
item.description: SpaceX said it’s creating the solar-powered network in order to “accommodate the explosive growth of data demands driven by AI.”

item.title: Trump’s plan to make housing affordable is faltering
item.description: “We’re not going to destroy the value of their homes so somebody who didn’t work very hard can buy a home,” Trump said.

item.title: Here’s what’s worth streaming in February on Netflix, Hulu, Peacock and more
Disney may soon have a new CEO. Here’s who it might be.
Oracle amps up its AI bet with a plan to raise as much as $50 billion this year
This ‘mutually assured destruction’ threat in the $7.3 trillion JGB market helps prevent Japan from triggering a debt crisis — for now
item.description: "Yet the JGB has unique features going for it, which limit the odds that the next debt crisis will be made in Japan."

item.title: U.S. stock futures fall, along with bitcoin and oil prices
Stock futures and bitcoin fall, as gold and silver’s sell-off may spilling over
